{"id":562497027,"lang":"java","time":"4 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1632850435,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/562497027/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Bits","memory":"38.4 MB","code":"public class Solution {\n    // you need treat n as an unsigned value\n    public int reverseBits(int n) {\n    if (n == 0) return 0;\n    \n    int result = 0;\n    for (int i = 0; i < 32; i++) {\n        result <<= 1;\n        if ((n & 1) == 1) result++;\n        n >>= 1;\n    }\n    return result;\n}\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-bits"}
